issue.title: [Doc][R] Document GCSFileSystem for R package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should update the [cloud storage vignette](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/fs.html) and the filesystem RD to show configuration and usage of GCSFileSystem.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16887?focusedCommentId=17571095) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13601
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13601>
